languages.text: "Проверим, насколько он знает усопшего. Что Леттард любил в своей работе, а что — ненавидел?"
"Let us see just how well he knows the deceased. Tell me, Requiescator, what did Forius like and dislike about his work?"
languages.original_text: "Проверим, насколько он знает усопшего. Что Леттард любил в своей работе, а что — ненавидел?"

traits.locale_text: "Let us see just how well he knows the deceased. Tell me, Requiescator, what did Forius like and dislike about his work?"
"Let us see how authentic he is. Lettard, what do you like and what do you hate about your work?"
"Let us see just how well he knows the deceased. Tell me, Requiescator, what did Forius like and dislike about his work?"
"Let us see just how authentic he is. Forius, tell me what you like and dislike about your work."
"Let us see just how well he knows the deceased. Tell me, Requiescator, what did Forius like and dislike about his work?"

"Let us see just how well he knows the deceased. Tell me, Requiescator, what did Forius like and dislike about his work?"
"Let us see just how well he knows the deceased. Tell me, Requiescator, what did Forius like and dislike about his work?"

languages.text: « Voyons à quel point il connaissait bien le défunt. Dites-moi, resquiescator, qu'est-ce que Forius aimait et déplorait à propos de son travail ? »
languages.original_text: "Let us see just how well he knows the deceased. Tell me, Requiescator, what did Forius like and dislike about his work?"

traits.locale_text: « Voyons à quel point il connaissait bien le défunt. Dites-moi, resquiescator, qu'est-ce que Forius aimait et déplorait à propos de son travail ? »

languages.text: «Veamos lo bien que conoce a los muertos. Dígame, requiescator, ¿qué le gustaba y detestaba Forius de su trabajo?».
languages.original_text: "Let us see just how well he knows the deceased. Tell me, Requiescator, what did Forius like and dislike about his work?"

traits.locale_text: «Veamos lo bien que conoce a los muertos. Dígame, requiescator, ¿qué le gustaba y detestaba Forius de su trabajo?».

languages.text: 「彼がどれほど故人のことを知っているのか、見てみようではないか。教えてくれ、鎮魂師よ、フォーリアスは自分の仕事の何を好み、何を嫌っていた？」
languages.original_text: "Let us see just how well he knows the deceased. Tell me, Requiescator, what did Forius like and dislike about his work?"

traits.locale_text: 「彼がどれほど故人のことを知っているのか、見てみようではないか。教えてくれ、鎮魂師よ、フォーリアスは自分の仕事の何を好み、何を嫌っていた？」

languages.text: “我们来看看这个人对死者有多少了解吧。回答我的问题，安魂师，弗里乌斯喜欢他工作的哪些方面，不喜欢哪些方面？”
languages.original_text: "Let us see just how well he knows the deceased. Tell me, Requiescator, what did Forius like and dislike about his work?"

traits.locale_text: “我们来看看这个人对死者有多少了解吧。回答我的问题，安魂师，弗里乌斯喜欢他工作的哪些方面，不喜欢哪些方面？”

languages.text: Mal sehen, wie gut er den Verstorbenen kennt. Sagt mir, Requiescator, was mochte Forius an seiner Arbeit und was nicht?
languages.original_text: "Let us see just how well he knows the deceased. Tell me, Requiescator, what did Forius like and dislike about his work?"

traits.locale_text: Mal sehen, wie gut er den Verstorbenen kennt. Sagt mir, Requiescator, was mochte Forius an seiner Arbeit und was nicht?

languages.text: "Bakalım rahmetliyi ne kadar iyi biliyormuş. Anlat bakalım Ağıtgetiren, Forius'un işine dair sevdiği ve sevmediği şeyler nelerdi?"
languages.original_text: "Let us see just how well he knows the deceased. Tell me, Requiescator, what did Forius like and dislike about his work?"
